page.title: 08BERRINGTON CHURCH (2)
page.content: The church is dedicated to{All Saints. {St.Margarets, Betton}is its daughter church. The{rector,}Rev.A.Gould (Priest in Charge) is also the priest for the parish of Cound. He lives in Berrington Rectory. Each{Sunday}there is a Service - Evensong on the 1st. Sunday each month, a Family Service on the 2nd. Sunday, and Communion Services on the other Sundays. Baptisms, weddings and funerals are also conducted as well as the Services for the special days in the Church Year. There is a{choir}of 9 and a group of 6{Bellringers.}There are 2 {Churchwardens}and a{Parochial Church {Council}of 15. A monthly{Parish News magazine (Â£1/year) and a news sheet (free to all parishioners) is sponsored.{Social highlights}are the Harvest Supper,the Whist Drive and the Parish Fete (3rd. Saturday in July).
